body:
A new round of crash tests highlight areas where Tesla's (NASDAQ:TSLA) Model S and BMW's (OTCPK:BAMXF) i3 failed to score as high as other electric vehicles rated by the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety.

The vehicles didn't fail any tests, but did fall short of meeting all the criteria needed to be rated a "Top Safety Pick."

Tesla made some production changes, however, and the updated model will be tested at some point by IIHS.
title: Model S, i3 fall short in crash tests
